department.dept_long_name: Department of African and African American Studies

course.title: African American Theatre, Drama, and Performance
course.description: A study of African American practices of performance from the 19th century through the present. This seminar will meet twice each week: first, in a classroom to discuss scholarship on black performance, and second, in a Harvard archive to work directly with primary materials. Topics include abolitionism, the Harlem Renaissance, the Black Arts Movement, and hiphop.
